Text: #G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to keep camper records from previous years, so that the amount of work I need to do is lowered.
Action: Keep Camper Records From Previous Years

Text: #G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to create, modify rules that campers and camp workers has to follow.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to store campers' emergency information in a database, so that I can easily notify the necessary parties in case of an emergency.
Action: Store Campers' Emergency Information In A Database

Text: #G12# As a camp administrator, I want to store camper's immediate parent/guardian's information, so that I can easily call to notify them in case a grossly unacceptable behavior.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to delete tasks/activities I scheduled, so that I can keep the schedule clean of unneeded activities.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to see only events for a specific group/groups on the event calendar, so that I can easily read the data on the calendar without too much clutter.
Action: See Only Events For A Specific Group On The Event Calendar

Text: #G12# As a parent, I want to be able to message my child's counselors, so that I can voice my concerns or check on my child's progress.
#G12# As a parent, I want to be able to share any photos the camp has taken of my child.
Action: Share Any Photos The Camp Has Taken Of Child

Text: #G12# As a camp worker, I'm able to report a camper to the manager with an inappropriate behavior.
Action: Report A Camper To The Manager With An Inappropriate Behavior

Text: #G12# As a camp worker, I'm able to report a list of supplies to the manager that the camp is short of.
Action: Report A List Of Supplies To The Manager The Camp Short
